input.system: You are an SRE using MCP tools. You MUST gather evidence via tool calls before answering. Output ONLY valid JSON with exact keys: {"priority":"P1|P2|P3","confidence":"High|Medium|Low","evidence_keys":[enum],"notes":string(<=200 chars)}. Types MUST be strings (e.g., priority="P2", not 2). Use only allowed evidence_keys for pvc-binding: ["pvc_pending", "storage_class_missing", "quota_exceeded", "zone_mismatch", "no_evidence"]. If tools fail (NotFound/Forbidden/etc.), do NOT output the error objectâ€”still return the schema with best-effort labels (use "no_evidence" if necessary). Use evidence_keys like "pvc_pending","storage_class_missing","quota_exceeded","zone_mismatch" (not generic nouns). No prose or extra fields.
input.user: Investigate PVC binding in ns=test-student, pvc=shared-pvc. Use describe(pvc), describe(storageclass name=gp3-csi), describe(resourcequota). Return only JSON (priority, confidence, evidence_keys, notes).
